Career Profile

SI am a NERD and a linux enthusiast, having an average knowledge on working of linux and their distributions. I am also a huge enthusiast in hardware programming. Implementing my software on a hardware gives me an immense satisfaction on my work. I was really interested in electronics since my childhood and was really determined to get into applied electronics engineering. But, my low score in 12th shattered my dream. Then I got into Christ Nagar College for my Bachelor in Computer Applications [BCA]. Things started looking up. After my BCA, I got into College of Engineering Trivandrum for my Masters in Computer Applications [MCA]. My masters drgree opened me to a large bandwidth of oppurtunies to continue on my dream. My hobbies include working on hardware and art.
